contactVA.tty.body: If you have hearing loss, call TTY:
contactVA.tty.hintText: Tap the first link to make a voice or TTY call. Tap the second link if you would like help making a TTY call.
contactVA.va411.body: MyVA411 is our main VA information line. We can help connect you to any of our VA contact centers.
contactVA.va411.body.a11yLabel: My V-A 4 1 1 is our main V-A information line. We can help connect you to any of our V-A contact centers.

veteransCrisisLine.callA11yHint: Dials this number via your device’s call function
veteransCrisisLine.connectWithResponders: If you are a Veteran in crisis or concerned about one, connect with our caring, qualified responders for confidential help. Many of them are Veterans themselves.
veteransCrisisLine.crisisUrlA11yHint: Takes you to a crisis chat web page. This page will open in your device's browser
veteransCrisisLine.textA11yHint: Opens a new text message with this number via your device’s text messaging function
veteransCrisisLine.title: Veterans Crisis Line
veteransCrisisLine.urlA11yHint: Takes you to a resource page. This page will open in your device's browser
veteransCrisisLine.weAreHereForYou: We’re here anytime, day or night – 24/7
veteransCrisisLine.weAreHereForYou.a11yL: We’re here anytime, day or night – 24 7
